 1.2 - TIME-BASED MEDIA
CAPTIONS (LIVE)(LEVEL AA)
On accessible websites...

Captions are provided for all live audio content in synchronized media. 

These websites...

Provide alternatives for time-based media.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
 A Web cast 

A news organization provides a live, captioned Web cast. 

Iâ€™d like to know a little more
[https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG22/Understanding/captions-live.html#examples]

Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.2, W3C World Wide Web Consortium
Recommendation 21 May 2021 (https://www.w3.org/TR/2021/WD-WCAG22-20210521/,
Latest version at https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG22/)
